data.title: The Met: Live in HD - La Rondine
data.meta_description: Puccini’s bittersweet love story arrives in cinemas, with soprano Angel Blue starring as the French courtesan Magda, opposite tenor Jonathan Tetelman as Rug ...
data.text:
Puccini’s bittersweet love story arrives in cinemas, with soprano Angel Blue starring as the French courtesan Magda, opposite tenor Jonathan Tetelman as Ruggero, an idealistic young man who offers her an alternative to her life of excess. Maestro Speranza Scappucci conducts Nicolas Joël’s Art Deco–inspired staging, which transports audiences from the heart of Parisian nightlife to a dreamy vision of the French Riviera. Soprano Emily Pogorelc and tenor Bekhzod Davronov complete the sterling cast as Lisette and Prunier.

Adult $25 | Senior $20 | Student $10 | All fees included

UMaine students free according to policy.

la_rondine_program_notes

Learn before you go!

Please join us for free informational sessions, held prior to each opera. You’re invited to attend to learn about the upcoming opera and meet up with other opera fans. Whether you have been to a zillion operas or have never been – these sessions are for you!

Tuesday, Apr. 16, at 4:15 pm at Dirigo Pines

Thursday, Apr. 18, at 5 pm at Orono Public Library
